statements: SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_level = 1;
SELECT patient_id, alert_message FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY alert_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT drug_name, alert_message FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_level < 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT AVG(alert_level) FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT patient_id, MIN(alert_level), MAX(alert_level) FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name LIKE '%paracetamol%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_message IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Moderate', 'Severe');
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_message LIKE '%Warning%' ORDER BY alert_level;
SELECT AVG(alert_level) AS avg_alert_level, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type, alert_level FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Metformin';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_level = 3;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = 200 AND interaction_type = 'Moderate';
SELECT patient_id, AVG(alert_level) AS avg_alert_level FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS num_patients FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_level > 2;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(alert_level) AS max_alert_level FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY drug_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT patient_id, MIN(alert_level) AS min_alert_level FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_message LIKE '%warning%';
SELECT drug_name, AVG(alert_level) AS avg_alert_level FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_message IS NOT NULL GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_level = 1;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(alert_level) AS total_alert_level FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT drug_name, MAX(alert_level) AS max_alert_level FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT patient_id, alert_message FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_message IS NOT NULL;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY drug_name, interaction_type;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(alert_level) AS avg_alert_level FROM drug_interactions WHERE alert_message LIKE '%urgent%' GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Other';
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1970-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients INNER JOIN drug_interactions ON patients.patient_id = drug_interactions.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, allergies, drug_name FROM patients INNER JOIN drug_interactions ON patients.patient_id = drug_interactions.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, interaction_description FROM patients LEFT JOIN drug_interactions ON patients.patient_id = drug_interactions.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, allergies, gender, interaction_description FROM patients INNER JOIN drug_interactions ON patients.patient_id = drug_interactions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND year(date_of_birth) > 1990
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients WHERE LENGTH(allergies) > 0
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin'
SELECT patient_name, interaction_description FROM patients JOIN drug_interactions ON patients.patient_id = drug_interactions.patient_id WHERE drug_name = 'Penicillin'
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Ibuprofen')
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, allergies FROM patients WHERE gender <> 'Other' AND year(date_of_birth) < 1980
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM patients
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, gender, drug_name, interaction_description FROM patients JOIN drug_interactions ON patients.patient_id = drug_interactions.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31'
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients WHERE allergies LIKE '%Peanuts%'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND year(date_of_birth) < 1970
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'M%'
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female')
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM patients WHERE allergies IS NULL

SELECT patient_name, gender, drug_name, interaction_description FROM patients JOIN drug_interactions ON patients.patient_id = drug_interactions.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, allergies FROM patients WHERE LENGTH(allergies) > 0 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Other'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM Interactions;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, birth_date, gender, allergies FROM Patients;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, dosage, prescription_date, patient_id FROM Medications;
SELECT interaction_id, medication_id1, medication_id2, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM Interactions;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, Interactions.interaction_type FROM Patients, Medications, Interactions;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, Interactions.interaction_type FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN Interactions ON Medications.medication_id = Interactions.medication_id1;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_prescriptions FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM Interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT medication_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), prescription_date)) AS average_days_since_prescription FROM Medications GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, prescription_date FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), prescription_date) > 30;

SELECT patient_name, interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN Interactions ON Medications.medication_id = Interactions.medication_id1 WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%adverse%' ORDER BY patient_name;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage, prescription_date, interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN Interactions ON Medications.medication_id = Interactions.medication_id1 WHERE interaction_type = 'Allergy' ORDER BY patient_name, prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg';
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM Patients WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN Interactions ON Medications.medication_id = Interactions.medication_id1 WHERE interaction_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM Medications WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE allergies LIKE '%peanut%';
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM Interactions WHERE medication_id1 = 1 AND medication_id2 = 2;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients WHERE YEAR(birth_date) < 1990;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), birth_date)) AS avg_age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(medication_id) AS num_medications FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM Interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT medication_name, SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(dosage, 1, CHAR_LENGTH(dosage) - 3) AS INT)) AS total_dosage FROM Medications GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM Patients WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT medication_name FROM Medications UNION SELECT interaction_description FROM Interactions;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(num_interactions) AS avg_interactions FROM (SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM Interactions GROUP BY patient_id) AS interactions_count;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, frequency FROM Medications WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM DrugInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM DrugInteractions;
SELECT * FROM Alerts;
SELECT alert_message, alert_status FROM Alerts;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, DrugInteractions.interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id1;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Alerts.alert_message FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id1 JOIN Alerts ON DrugInteractions.interaction_id = Alerts.interaction_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, DrugInteractions.interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id1;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, DrugInteractions.interaction_description, Alerts.alert_message FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id1 JOIN Alerts ON DrugInteractions.interaction_id = Alerts.interaction_id;
SELECT patient_name, allergies FROM Patients WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM DrugInteractions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%contraindication%';
SELECT alert_message, alert_status FROM Alerts WHERE alert_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE frequency = 'Twice Daily';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency, Patients.patient_name FROM Medications INNER JOIN Patients ON Medications.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description, medication_name FROM DrugInteractions LEFT JOIN Medications ON DrugInteractions.medication_id1 = Medications.medication_id;

SELECT alert_message, alert_status, Patients.patient_name, medication_name FROM Alerts INNER JOIN DrugInteractions ON Alerts.interaction_id = DrugInteractions.interaction_id INNER JOIN Medications ON DrugInteractions.medication_id1 = Medications.medication_id INNER JOIN Patients ON Medications.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, allergies, frequency FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_id FROM DrugInteractions;
SELECT alert_message, interaction_description FROM Alerts INNER JOIN DrugInteractions ON Alerts.interaction_id = DrugInteractions.interaction_id;
SELECT interaction_id, medication_name FROM DrugInteractions LEFT JOIN Medications ON DrugInteractions.medication_id2 = Medications.medication_id;

SELECT patient_name, alert_message, alert_status FROM Patients INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id INNER JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id1 INNER JOIN Alerts ON DrugInteractions.interaction_id = Alerts.interaction_id WHERE alert_status = 'Active';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(CHAR_LENGTH(patient_name)) AS avg_name_length FROM Patients;

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_alerts FROM Patients INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id INNER JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id1 INNER JOIN Alerts ON DrugInteractions.interaction_id = Alerts.interaction_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM Medications INNER JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id2 GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(CHAR_LENGTH(patient_name)) AS avg_name_length, SUM(CHAR_LENGTH(patient_name)) AS total_name_length FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(DISTINCT gender) AS gender_count FROM Patients GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM Medications;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_dob, MIN(date_of_birth) AS youngest_dob FROM Patients;
SELECT alert_status, COUNT(*) AS num_alerts FROM Alerts GROUP BY alert_status;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(date_of_birth) - MIN(date_of_birth) AS age_difference FROM Patients;

SELECT patient_name, allergies, interaction_description, alert_message, alert_status FROM Patients INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id INNER JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication_id1 INNER JOIN Alerts ON DrugInteractions.interaction_id = Alerts.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, medical_history FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM DrugInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM DrugInteractions;
SELECT * FROM Allergies;
SELECT patient_id, allergen FROM Allergies;
SELECT * FROM Alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_date FROM Alerts;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients, Medications WHERE Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients, Medications WHERE Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, DrugInteractions.interaction_description FROM Patients, Medications, DrugInteractions WHERE Patients.patient_id = DrugInteractions.medication1_id AND Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication2_id;
SELECT patient_name, allergen, reaction FROM Patients, Allergies WHERE Patients.patient_id = Allergies.patient_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Alerts.alert_message, Alerts.alert_date FROM Patients, Alerts WHERE Patients.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, interaction_description, allergen, reaction FROM Patients, Medications, DrugInteractions, Allergies WHERE Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id AND Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication1_id AND DrugInteractions.medication2_id = Allergies.patient_id;

SELECT Alerts.alert_message, patient_name, medication_name, interaction_description FROM Alerts, Patients, Medications, DrugInteractions WHERE Patients.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id AND Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication1_id AND DrugInteractions.medication2_id = Alerts.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage, allergen, reaction FROM Patients, Medications, Allergies WHERE Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id AND Medications.medication_id = Allergies.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_id, Medications.medication_id, DrugInteractions.interaction_id, Allergies.allergy_id, Alerts.alert_id FROM Patients, Medications, DrugInteractions, Allergies, Alerts WHERE Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id AND Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication1_id AND DrugInteractions.medication2_id = Allergies.patient_id AND Allergies.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT medication_name, frequency, side_effects FROM Medications WHERE dosage <= 20 AND frequency = 'Twice a day';
SELECT patient_name, gender, medical_history FROM Patients JOIN Allergies ON Patients.patient_id = Allergies.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM Medications;
SELECT patient_name, alert_message, alert_date FROM Patients JOIN Alerts ON Patients.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM Alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history, allergen FROM Patients JOIN Allergies ON Patients.patient_id = Allergies.patient_id WHERE allergen = 'Peanuts';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, side_effects FROM Medications WHERE medication_id IN (SELECT medication1_id FROM DrugInteractions WHERE medication2_id = 3);
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medication_name FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, alert_message, alert_date FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Alerts ON Patients.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id WHERE alert_date IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(dosage) AS average_dosage FROM Medications;
SELECT patient_name, alert_message, alert_date FROM Patients JOIN Alerts ON Patients.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id WHERE alert_message LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT patient_name, alert_message, alert_date FROM Patients JOIN Alerts ON Patients.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM (SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female') AS filtered_patients;
SELECT patient_name, allergy_id FROM Patients JOIN Allergies ON Patients.patient_id = Allergies.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(allergy_id) > 1;

SELECT patient_name, interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN DrugInteractions ON Patients.patient_id = DrugInteractions.medication1_id JOIN Medications ON DrugInteractions.medication2_id = Medications.medication_id;

SELECT patient_name, interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN DrugInteractions ON Patients.patient_id = DrugInteractions.medication2_id JOIN Medications ON DrugInteractions.medication1_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM Alerts GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
